name: SHINE for reddit
description:
Shine Reddit Dark Theme for SHINE

Requires:
1. SHINE for reddit https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/shine-for-reddit/acoiihnnfofnpbnofdcgcapbjlcopifa?hl=en
2. SHINE > settings > list settings > set display content to the right of list items  
3. Reddit Enhancement Suite optional but recommended
